QuestData.Title: Humbling the Terrors
QuestData.Description:
When we first got here, I be findin' a whole buncha problems on da other side a Zardrax's barrow.
Dere be dese monstrous zombies walkin' around da area. We gotta take 'em down ta make sure dey don't get ta Zuldazar.
I used me voodoo ta be modifyin' dat fetish ya just found. Use dis new fetish ta weaken and kill dem zombies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat $1oa Reconstructed Terrors by weakening them with the Modified Blood Fetish.
